mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN T1.RENTAL_TN = '0' THEN T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST ELSE 0 END AS RENTAL_RGST_COST /* 등록비용 */ , CASE WHEN T1.RENTAL_TN = '0' THEN T2.CNTRAM_DSC_AMT ELSE 0 END AS DSC_AMT /* 등록비할인 */ , T1.CNTR_TAM /* 렌탈총액 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD', T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD /* 리스구분 */ , T3.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO||'-'||T3.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS OJ_DTL_CNTR1 /* 1+1연계계약 */ , T4.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO||'-'||T4.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS OJ_DTL_CNTR2 /* 제휴연계계약 */ , T1.RENTAL_AMT /* 렌탈료1월요금 */ , T1.RENTAL_DSC_AMT /* 렌탈료1할인 */ , T1.CNTR_PTRM /* 렌탈료1개월 */ , T1.RENTAL_AMT2 /* 렌탈료2월요금 */ , T1.RENTAL_DSC_AMT2 /* 렌탈료2할인 */ , T1.RENTAL_PTRM2 /* 렌탈료2개월 */ , T5.DUTY_USE_MCN /* 의무기간(일) */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RENTAL_DSC_DV_CD', T2.SELL_DSC_DV_CD) AS SELL_DSC_DV_CD /* 할인구분 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RENTAL_DSC_TP_CD ', T2.SELL_DSC_TP_CD) AS SELL_DSC_TP_CD /* 할인유형 */ , T2.SV_PRD /* 관리주기(개월) */ , T6.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO||'-'||T6.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS OJ_DTL_CNTR3 /* 모종계약 */ , T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT /* 매출일자 */ , T1.REQD_DTM /* 철거요청일자 */ , T1.CAN_DT /* 취소일자 */ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 /* WELLS매출월마감내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /* 계약상세 */ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T3 /* 계약관계 */ ON T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위-계약상세*/ AND T3.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215' /*계약관계-1+1연계*/ LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T4 /* 계약관계 */ ON T4.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위-계약상세*/ AND T4.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22L' /*계약관계-플래너상조제휴*/ LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_RENTAL_ADN_SV_IZ T5 /* 렌탈부가서비스내역 */ ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T6 /* 계약관계 */ ON T6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T6.CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위-계약상세*/ AND T6.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' /*계약관계-모종결합*/ WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 필수변수-계약번호 */ AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /* 필수변수-계약일련번호 */ AND T1.SL_CL_YM = SUBSTR(#{slRcogDt}, 1, 6) /* 필수변수-매출인식일자 */

SELECT T2.SELL_AMT --월회비 , T2.STPL_PTRM --약정개월 , T2.SV_PRD AS SV_PRD1 --관리주기 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RENTAL_DSC_TP_CD ', T2.SELL_DSC_TP_CD) AS SELL_DSC_TP_CD --할인유형 , T2.DSC_AMT --할인금액 , T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT --가입일자 , T1.CAN_DT --탈퇴일자 , T2.SPP_DUEDT --방문일자 , T3.VST_NMN_N --방문차월 , T2.SV_PRD AS SV_PRD2 --방문주기 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 --계약상세 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ST.CNTR_NO,ST.CNTR_SN ORDER BY ST.WK_SN DESC) AS RN , ST.CNTR_NO , ST.CNTR_SN , ST.VST_NMN_N FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ ST) T3 --고객서비스정기BS주기내역 ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.RN = 1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SL_CL_YM = SUBSTR(#{slRcogDt},1,6)

SELECT T2.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N --무상멤버십 , T2.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N AS FRISU_AS_PTRM_N1 --무상A/S , T2.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N AS FRISU_AS_PTRM_N2 --유상멤버십 , T1.SELL_AMT --판매금액 , T1.FNL_AMT --계약총액 , T1.CNTR_AMT AS CNTR_AMT1 --청약금 , T1.CNTR_AMT AS CNTR_AMT2 --인수금 , T1.ISTM_PCAM_AMT --할부금액 , T1.MM_ISTM_AMT --월할부금 , T1.ISTM_MCN --할부개월 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 --계약상세 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T2 --계약WELLS상세 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
